metadata.synopsis: Two teenagers (Rob Morrow, Johnny Depp) staying in a Florida resort pursue girls, then they encounter a jewel thief.

reviews: Private Resort fares best in its lighthearted and freewheeling first half...
The movie claims it is a comedy, though a laugh or even a chuckle is a rarity.
There's nothing very new or original in this dull sex comedy.
Johnny Depp and Rob Morrow make waves in this '80s sex comedy.
The film will make you long for the nuance of Bachelor Party
An aggressively obnoxious and laugh-free stupid-fest that Mr. Depp will probably cringe at the next time he's walking through his favorite DVD shop.
